name: Unfinished
description:
So long story short I've been really busy and haven't had time to do much. It took me about a week after the jam to finish the game, and even longer to upload it.

Thank you for your time! <3

You and the Fire of Life can take damage.

Left and Right arrow keys to move.

A is to attack.

S is to jump(you have a triple jump)

When you hit an enemy it turns them into a projectile that can hit other enemies.

Esc to end the game. Enter to Restart (do this if you fall of the level).

That's about it, have fun!
